detail_desc: Wide pyjama bottoms in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jacket with a lined hood, diagonal opening with press-studs at the top and a zip to the hem, printed kangaroo pocket with sewn-on ears, and ribbed cuffs. Joggers with elastication and a contrasting colour drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jacket with a lined hood, diagonal opening with press-studs at the top and a zip to the hem, printed kangaroo pocket with sewn-on ears, and ribbed cuffs. Joggers with elastication and a contrasting colour drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with stretch. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0575471.
